choices: A regression of mpg against all other variables

newvar is set to 0 for these observations
newvar is set to missing (.) for these observations

By gender ascending, then age ascending within gender groups
By age descending, then gender descending
Randomly within each age-gender combination
Calculates summary statistics for income within each value of group
Sorts the data by group then calculates overall summary statistics for income

Generates an error if any missing values are found
A single number representing the overall mean age
A variable containing each group's mean age, repeated for all observations in that group
